suggestions:
It seems like there have been numerous issues and frustrations reported regarding recent updates to Instagram. These include problems with image editing, story loading, audio playback, reel functionality, app stability, layout changes, chat features, content discoverability, and more.

While Instagram continuously works on improving its platform based on user feedback, it appears that some users have experienced challenges with the recent updates. If you're facing specific issues, it may be helpful to check for any available app updates, clear cache or data in your device settings, and report bugs directly through Instagram's support channels.

Please keep in mind that while these concerns are valid, they might not reflect every user's experience with the platform.
